:py:mod:`pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.numerictypes`
===============================================

.. py:module:: pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.numerictypes

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Numeric type aliases for high-performance scientific computing, matching Fortran kind parameters, using NumPy.

   Author: Rahul R. Sah



Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   pulsesuite.libpulsesuite.numerictypes.NumericTypes




.. py:class:: NumericTypes


   Provides high-performance numeric type aliases matching Fortran kind parameters using NumPy.

   .. attribute:: i8b

      64-bit integer type.

      :type: Type[np.int64]

   .. attribute:: i4b

      32-bit integer type.

      :type: Type[np.int32]

   .. attribute:: i2b

      16-bit integer type.

      :type: Type[np.int16]

   .. attribute:: i1b

      8-bit integer type.

      :type: Type[np.int8]

   .. attribute:: sp

      Single precision (32-bit) floating point type.

      :type: Type[np.float32]

   .. attribute:: dp

      Double precision (64-bit) floating point type.

      :type: Type[np.float64]

   .. attribute:: qp

      Quad precision (128-bit) floating point type, or double if unavailable.

      :type: Type[np.floating]

   .. py:attribute:: i8b
      :type: Type[numpy.int64]

      

   .. py:attribute:: i4b
      :type: Type[numpy.int32]

      

   .. py:attribute:: i2b
      :type: Type[numpy.int16]

      

   .. py:attribute:: i1b
      :type: Type[numpy.int8]

      

   .. py:attribute:: sp
      :type: Type[numpy.float32]

      

   .. py:attribute:: dp
      :type: Type[numpy.float64]
